Discover Red Brick Winery

Artisan Products

Explore a unique selection of artisan products at Red Brick Winery including delicious honey from hives on our property, local artwork, custom gift baskets and specialty gourmet items.

We know that wine is best enjoyed when paired with delicious flavors and memorable experiences. We are proud of our artisan products and continually curate our eclectic offerings.

Our artisan products make great gifts, either on their own or coupled with a bottle of our wine. We invite you to visit our Glen Mills, PA tasting room to peruse our artisan store.

See a Sample!

Featured Products

Local Honey

Harvested from our on-premise hives by local beekeepers, our Red Brick honey is pure, unprocessed, and full of health benefits, ideal for sweetening drinks or as a gourmet topping.

  • On-Premise Hives
  • Nutrient-Rich
  • Decorative Bottles
  • Multiple Sizes

Featured Products

Baskets & Boards

Let Red Brick Winery create your perfect gift for any occasion. Need a hostess or housewarming gift? Our gourmet gift baskets and charcuterie boards are easy to grab on the go or can be custom-designed for you, even delivered and setup at your kitchen island!

  • Wines & Gourmet Products
  • Gifts and Corporate Events
  • Beautiful Packaging
  • Customizable Options

Featured Products

Gourmet Foods

We have traveled the world and discovered the joy of delicious gourmet foods. They can be the star of a meal or a special ingredient in your pantry. Explore our specialty gourmet foods such as pasta, olive oil, biscotti, etc., all carefully selected to complement our wines.

  • Gourmet Products
  • Imported Delicacies
  • Stock Your Pantry
  • Hostess & Housewarming

Featured Products

Wall Art & Decor

Red Brick Winery is a vibrant member of the community and cherishes all that our locations have to offer – we celebrate the beauty of our surroundings. Whether you need a stunning piece of home decor or a thoughtful gift, we’ve teamed up with our local artist friends and neighbors to offer you something truly unique.

  • Local Artists
  • Community
  • Gifts & Decor
  • Commissions

Napa Valley winery offering a tasting room, retail purchase, wine club memberships and wine events in Glen Mills, PA.
